$:/plugins/.mr/solution/keywords-templat.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/.mr/solution/keywords-templat.text:
\define keywords-body(kwd)
<$list filter="[tag[$kwd$]] [search:keywords[$kwd$]]" variable="itemTid">
<$link to=<<itemTid>> ><$text text=<<itemTid>>/></$link>
</$list>
\end
<!-- keywords-body lists all tiddler tagged with kwd or have kwd in their keywords field -->

<$set name="transclusion" value=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/tag">> >
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible sl-keywords" popup=<<transclusion>> >
<$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/>
</$button>
<$reveal state=<<transclusion>> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down">
<$link to=<<currentTiddler>> ><$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/></$link>
<hr>
<$macrocall $name="keywords-body" kwd=<<currentTiddler>> />
</$reveal>
</$set>
$:/plugins/.mr/solution/keywords-templat.title: $:/plugins/.mr/solution/keywords-template

\define mbox(text:"", color:"bg-primary", width:"100%")
$text$
\end !! Message box This is a small utility to create colorful message box. The syntax is as follows: ``` <> ``` Where * `text`: The text to be shown in the message box * `color`: defualt value is //bg-primary// (light blue). The background colors can be used are ** bg-warning ** bg-success ** bg-danger ** bg-primary * `width`: the width of box (default: 100%)

$:/plugins/.mr/solution/readme.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/.mr/solution/readme.text:
! Create a new solution 
# From the page controls click on the ''question mark'' icon to create a new solution tiddler
# Fill in the fileds
#* ''responder'' (e.g author, developer, or responder in forums)
#* ''keywords''
#* ''url''
# Add your description to tiddler body
# Save your new solution tiddler

<<mbox color:"bg-warning" width:75% text: """
''Keywords'' are space separated words. For example if your keywords are //variable//, //macro//, //count//, fill your keywords field like this:`variable macro count`.
""">>

!! Keywords work like tag
Each keyword in the view mode is ''clickable''. On click it lists all tiddlers tagged with that keyword and all tiddlers have this keyword in their `keywords` field. This feature is like tag pills.


! Search in keywords and responder
It is quite simple to later search your wiki and find solution related to specific subject. Here two different methods are presented

!! Search using Filter tab
<<<
* Open the [[Advanced Search|$:/AdvancedSearch]] {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} by clicking the magnifier in the sidebar
* Click on the `Filter` tab and put your search criteria in the inputbox
<<<

!! Sample searches
<<<
* Search for `macro` in solution tiddlers
** Search criteria: `[search:keywords[macro]]`
* Search for tiddlers on `macro` but not `TOC`
** Search criteria: `[search:keywords[macro]!search:keywords[TOC]]`
<<<

!! Search using the new In Fields tab
<<<
Solution pluging adds an additional tab to [[Advanced Search|$:/AdvancedSearch]] {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} allowing you to search in field contents. The field can be choosen from a drop down menu and it is a case sensitive search by default.

<<mbox color:"bg-success" width:75% text: """
This is a small code by [[Tobias Beer|http://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Searching%20In%20Tiddler%20Fields]].""">>
<<<

! Installation
Simply drag and drop the below link into your wiki

* [[$:/plugins/.mr/solution]]

!! Examples
* https://kookma.github.io/Solution/
* More examples: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Scripts
$:/plugins/.mr/solution/readme.title: $:/plugins/.mr/solution/readme

$:/plugins/.mr/solution/philosophy.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/.mr/solution/philosophy.text:
!Philosophy
There are many questions and answers in [[TW Google forum|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/tiddlywiki]], some of them shows elegant solution to raised questions and worth to be archives in a manner to be accessible easily later on.

!! Solution plugin
This is a small plugin to create solution tiddlers. It adds a button to page controls and uses template to show the author, reference post and also lets to add keywords. The keywords act like tags, so, clicking on them shows a list of all tiddlers tagged with this keyword or has this keyword in its `keywords` field.

!! Search in keywords and responder
The solution plugin adds a new search tab `In Fields` to Advanced search, allows make search in keywords and responder.

!! Usage and installation
For usage and installtion see [[readme|$:/plugins/.mr/solution/readme]]

<<mbox color:"bg-warning" width:75% text: """
''Solution tiddler'' is used to document the questions and answers (Q&A) from TW Google forum or public TW wikis.""">>
